verse: मत्स्यादिभिरवतारै रवता रवता सदा वसुधाम् । परमेश्वर परिपाल्यो भवता भवतापभीतोऽहम् ॥

words_meaning.भवतापभीतोऽहम्: I, who am fearful of the cycle of existence

overall_meaning: The verse acknowledges the continuous incarnations of the Supreme Lord, such as Matsya (fish) and others, who always protect the earth. It expresses the devotee's fear of the cycle of existence and their reliance on the Supreme Lord for protection.
